last_episode_to_air.name: Whenever You're Ready
last_episode_to_air.overview: Michael works with the Joint Council of Afterlife Affairs to smooth out kinks in the system. Jason and Tahani move on. Eleanor tries to influence Chidi.

name: The Good Place
overview: Eleanor Shellstrop, an ordinary woman who, through an extraordinary string of events, enters the afterlife where she comes to realize that she hasn't been a very good person. With the help of her wise afterlife mentor, she's determined to shed her old way of living and discover the awesome (or at least the pretty good) person within.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: What happens when we die? It’s a question everyone has asked, since the beginning of time. But when Eleanor Shellstrop dies tragically, she finds out that the afterlife is amazing; full of frozen yogurt, soulmates, and wonderful people who have done incredible things with their lives. It is absolutely perfect. The only problem is Eleanor isn’t supposed to be in The Good Place. In fact, her life decisions wouldn’t have even gotten her close. But due to a clerical error, she’s been given someone else’s reward and now has to struggle with being good in order to make sure her secret isn’t discovered.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Everything Is Still Fine. Just Fine. After Michael’s disastrous attempt to torture Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason for eternity goes belly-up, Eleanor and the gang are rebooted and Michael has revised his plan to keep his torture subjects separate. Only now, Michael’s soul is on the line, as his boss, Shawn, won’t allow another attempt!

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: At the end of Season 2, Michael appeared in front of the Judge, also to argue that the humans may have been judged unfairly, and deserve a second chance. With a snap of her fingers, the Judge sent the humans back to Earth, in a new timeline where they never died. Also seeking redemption, along with Eleanor, are Senegalese philosopher Chidi Anagonye, who is tortured by decision-making; elegant Pakistani-British socialite Tahani Al-Jamil, and dance-obsessed Floridian Jason Mendoza. Michael is aided by Janet, a human-esque repository for all of the knowledge in the universe. However, when Michael and Janet begin interfering with the humans' lives, to make sure they wind up in The Good Place, they're going against the Judge's orders and on borrowed time. When The Bad Place gets involved, Michael and Janet must ask themselves, just how far they'll go to keep the humans out of The Bad Place.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: The experiment on self-improvement in the afterlife begins. Shawn repeatedly tries to sabotage the experiment, first by sending a demon to impersonate one of the test subjects, and then by having a Bad Janet impersonate Janet. Once these deceptions have been uncovered, the four human test subjects are Chidi himself, Simone, gossip columnist John, and entitled chauvinist Brent. Eleanor and the rest of the team encourage the four to become friends, study ethics together, and improve as people. By the conclusion of the year-long experiment, all but Brent have shown moral improvement, and even Brent shows potential for change at the last minute. The Judge decides that the afterlife system is indeed flawed—but to mend it, all of humanity must be erased from existence.

episodes.name: Everything Is Fine
episodes.overview: Newly-deceased Eleanor Shellstrop is sent to the Good Place, but only by mistake; Eleanor is determined to become a better person in her afterlife with help from friends Chidi and Janet; Eleanor tries to prove to Chidi that she's worthy of his help.

episodes.name: Flying
episodes.overview: Eleanor tries to prove to Chidi that she is worthy of his help. Meanwhile, Tahani and Jianyu try to help Michael feel better about the unknown flaw in his Neighborhood.

episodes.name: Tahani Al-Jamil
episodes.overview: Chidi begins formally teaching Eleanor about ethics, and lesson No. 1 is: be kind to your neighbor. Michael and Janet help Chidi find a new, exciting hobby.

episodes.name: Jason Mendoza
episodes.overview: Eleanor has a hard time remaining hidden.  Michael asks Tahani to assist a neighbor in finding her true purpose.

episodes.name: Category 55 Emergency Doomsday Crisis
episodes.overview: Eleanor's eagerness to learn ethics from Chidi becomes the full-time job he never wanted. Meanwhile, Michael and Janet focus their attention on a Neighborhood emergency.

episodes.name: What We Owe to Each Other
episodes.overview: Eleanor is enlisted to help Michael with an important task that could determine her fate in the Good Place. Meanwhile, Chidi agrees to be the third wheel in an effort to help out his friend.

episodes.name: The Eternal Shriek
episodes.overview: Eleanor puts Janet in her crosshairs to save Michael from eternal suffering.

episodes.name: Most Improved Player
episodes.overview: Michael has a private meeting with Eleanor, who is put to the test. Also, Chidi harbors a secret and mulls over what to do.

episodes.name: ...Someone Like Me as a Member
episodes.overview: Michael faces a challenge when he tries to resolve an unprecedented situation. In addition, Chidi makes a connection, to Eleanor's chagrin, and a different side of Janet emerges.

episodes.name: Chidi's Choice
episodes.overview: Eleanor makes a surprising personal discovery. Meanwhile, Michael tasks an indecisive Chidi with coming to an important decision and Jianyu makes a big announcement.

episodes.name: What's My Motivation
episodes.overview: Eleanor and Tahani hatch a plan while Michael makes a startling discovery. Meanwhile, Chidi confides in Eleanor after learning some interesting news.

episodes.name: Mindy St. Claire
episodes.overview: With the help of Chidi and Tahani, Michael faces his biggest challenge yet. Meanwhile, Eleanor, Jianyu and Janet are faced with a monumental decision.

episodes.name: Michael's Gambit
episodes.overview: Eleanor and her pals contemplate their fates.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: What happens when we die? It’s a question everyone has asked, since the beginning of time. But when Eleanor Shellstrop dies tragically, she finds out that the afterlife is amazing; full of frozen yogurt, soulmates, and wonderful people who have done incredible things with their lives. It is absolutely perfect. The only problem is Eleanor isn’t supposed to be in The Good Place. In fact, her life decisions wouldn’t have even gotten her close. But due to a clerical error, she’s been given someone else’s reward and now has to struggle with being good in order to make sure her secret isn’t discovered.

episodes.name: Everything Is Great!
episodes.overview: Having had their memories erased by ambitious master architect Michael, Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason again settle into the Good Place, unaware of what has previously transpired...except that Eleanor discovers the one clue she had left for herself and attempts to piece things together.

episodes.name: Dance Dance Resolution
episodes.overview: Michael continues to work out the kinks in his grand plan. Meanwhile, Eleanor stumbles across a secret.

episodes.name: Team Cockroach
episodes.overview: Michael approaches things from a new angle. Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason struggle to make a collective decision.

episodes.name: Existential Crisis
episodes.overview: Tahani throws a dinner party to impress. Eleanor and Jason both have to lend a hand when things don't go as planned.

episodes.name: The Trolley Problem
episodes.overview: Chidi and Eleanor tackle a famous ethical dilemma, leading to a conflict with Michael. Meanwhile, Tahani harbors a secret and confides in Janet.

episodes.name: Janet and Michael
episodes.overview: When the Neighborhood experiences a small glitch, Michael has to resolve the issue with Janet before it gets out of control.

episodes.name: Derek
episodes.overview: Janet creates a big problem for Michael. Meanwhile, Eleanor lets Chidi  in on a secret, and Jason puts Tahani in a difficult position.

episodes.name: Leap to Faith
episodes.overview: Michael receives a surprise visitor. Meanwhile, Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason attempt to solve a riddle.

episodes.name: Best Self
episodes.overview: Michael finds himself in a bind. Meanwhile, Eleanor sparks an idea that has Chidi, Tahani, Jason and even Janet laying their feelings on the line.

episodes.name: Rhonda, Diana, Jake, and Trent
episodes.overview: Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani, Janet, and Jason head to a destination that may have lasting implications.

episodes.name: The Burrito
episodes.overview: Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani, and Jason consider just how much they have (or have not) improved. Michael is left to deal with the consequences of his recent actions.

episodes.name: Somewhere Else
episodes.overview: Michael makes a plea. Eleanor looks to take the high road. Michael tries to pull a rabbit out of a hat.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Everything Is Still Fine. Just Fine. After Michael’s disastrous attempt to torture Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason for eternity goes belly-up, Eleanor and the gang are rebooted and Michael has revised his plan to keep his torture subjects separate. Only now, Michael’s soul is on the line, as his boss, Shawn, won’t allow another attempt!

episodes.name: Everything Is Bonzer!
episodes.overview: Michael intervenes in the near-death accidents of Eleanor, Chidi, Tahani and Jason on Earth, in hopes that a second chance at life allows them to become better versions of themselves.

episodes.name: The Brainy Bunch
episodes.overview: Michael's grand scheme hits an unexpected snag and forces him to take drastic measures.

episodes.name: The Snowplow
episodes.overview: A surprising announcement from one of the humans threatens to dissolve the group.

episodes.name: Jeremy Bearimy
episodes.overview: The group explores the three main branches of ethical thought.

episodes.name: The Ballad of Donkey Doug
episodes.overview: Jason visits with some people from his past while Chidi gets help in resolving a problem.

episodes.name: A Fractured Inheritance
episodes.overview: Eleanor makes a startling discovery that tests her resolve, Tahani looks to make amends and Janet does some bonding.

episodes.name: The Worst Possible Use of Free Will
episodes.overview: Eleanor recalls some forgotten events from her past.

episodes.name: Don't Let The Good Life Pass You By
episodes.overview: Michael and Janet visit the person they believe to be the blueprint for how to live a good life on Earth; Eleanor turns to Tahani for advice.

episodes.name: Janet(s)
episodes.overview: While Eleanor and the gang contend with an intense out-of-body experience, Michael hatches a plan with Janet's help.

episodes.name: The Book of Dougs
episodes.overview: Michael's resolve is put to the test. Meanwhile, Jason wrestles with his feelings and Chidi surprises Eleanor.

episodes.name: Chidi Sees the Time-Knife
episodes.overview: Michael arranges an important meeting and Janet makes a reconnection.

episodes.name: Pandemonium
episodes.overview: Michael's crisis forces Eleanor to assume the title of the neighborhood architect. Tahani makes a discovery about the new humans.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: At the end of Season 2, Michael appeared in front of the Judge, also to argue that the humans may have been judged unfairly, and deserve a second chance. With a snap of her fingers, the Judge sent the humans back to Earth, in a new timeline where they never died. Also seeking redemption, along with Eleanor, are Senegalese philosopher Chidi Anagonye, who is tortured by decision-making; elegant Pakistani-British socialite Tahani Al-Jamil, and dance-obsessed Floridian Jason Mendoza. Michael is aided by Janet, a human-esque repository for all of the knowledge in the universe. However, when Michael and Janet begin interfering with the humans' lives, to make sure they wind up in The Good Place, they're going against the Judge's orders and on borrowed time. When The Bad Place gets involved, Michael and Janet must ask themselves, just how far they'll go to keep the humans out of The Bad Place.

episodes.name: A Girl from Arizona (1)
episodes.overview: With Eleanor assuming the role of the architect, the group adapts to the challenges facing them when four test subjects inhabit a new neighborhood under their supervision.

episodes.name: A Girl from Arizona (2)
episodes.overview: Eleanor, Michael, Janet and Tahani have their hands full when the new residents begin to show their true colors. Jason receives some unsettling news.

episodes.name: Chillaxing
episodes.overview: Michael and Eleanor discover something troubling and turn to an unusual source for help. Tahani lends her expertise to assist with one of the new residents.

episodes.name: Tinker, Tailor, Demon, Spy
episodes.overview: Uncertainty abounds when an unexpected visitor arrives.

episodes.name: Employee of the Bearimy
episodes.overview: Michael and Jason hatch a plan. Eleanor learns firsthand the difficulties of running the neighborhood.

episodes.name: A Chip Driver Mystery
episodes.overview: One of the new residents creates a division in the ranks.

episodes.name: Help is Other People
episodes.overview: On the last day of the experiment, Chidi is faced with one final ethical dilemma.

episodes.name: The Funeral to End All Funerals
episodes.overview: The group awaits the Judge's final decision on the fate of human existence.

episodes.name: The Answer
episodes.overview: In an attempt to plan a better future, Chidi considers his past.

episodes.name: You've Changed, Man
episodes.overview: The group works to negotiate an afterlife plan with Shawn and the judge.

episodes.name: Mondays, Am I Right?
episodes.overview: Michael runs some tests and Chidi gets some good advice from Jason.

episodes.name: Patty
episodes.overview: The group makes some new friends.

episodes.name: Whenever You're Ready
episodes.overview: Michael works with the Joint Council of Afterlife Affairs to smooth out kinks in the system. Jason and Tahani move on. Eleanor tries to influence Chidi.

By the conclusion of the year-long experiment, all but Brent have shown moral improvement, and even Brent shows potential for change at the last minute. The Judge decides that the afterlife system is indeed flawed—but to mend it, all of humanity must be erased from existence.
